name: crewAI (crewAIInc)
description: [项目级] Framework for orchestrating role-playing, autonomous AI agents. By fostering collaborative intelligence, CrewAI empowers agents to work together seamlessly, tackling complex tasks.。来源: https://github.com/crewAIInc/crewAI

genes.title: 项目概述
genes.content:
Framework for orchestrating role-playing, autonomous AI agents. By fostering collaborative intelligence, CrewAI empowers agents to work together seamlessly, tackling complex tasks.

来源: https://github.com/crewAIInc/crewAI
语言: Python
Stars: 44338

genes.title: 安装与快速开始
genes.content:
Setup and run your first CrewAI agents by following this tutorial.

[![CrewAI Getting Started Tutorial](https://img.youtube.com/vi/-kSOTtYzgEw/hqdefault.jpg)](https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=-kSOTtYzgEw "CrewAI Getting Started Tutorial")

###

Learning Resources

Learn CrewAI through our comprehensive courses:

- [Multi AI Agent Systems with CrewAI](https://www.deeplearning.ai/short-courses/multi-ai-agent-systems-with-crewai/) - Master the fundamentals of multi-agent systems
- [Practical Multi AI Agents and Advanced Use Cases](https://www.deeplearning.ai/short-courses/practical-multi-ai-agents

genes.title: 核心特性
genes.content:
- **Tracing & Observability**: Monitor and track your AI agents and workflows in real-time, including metrics, logs, and traces.
- **Unified Control Plane**: A centralized platform for managing, monitoring, and scaling your AI agents and workflows.
- **Seamless Integrations**: Easily connect with existing enterprise systems, data sources, and cloud infrastructure.
- **Advanced Security**: Built-in robust security and compliance measures ensuring safe deployment and management.
- **Actionable Insights**: Real-time analytics and reporting to optimize performance and decision-making.
- **24/7 Sup
